rooms.name: Dusty Entrance Hall
rooms.desc: Faint sunlight filters through cracks in the collapsed ceiling, revealing scattered debris and faded tapestries.

rooms.name: Abandoned Guardroom
rooms.desc: Rusted spears litter the floor and torn banners hang limply from iron rings. A faded flyer on the wall advertises DEFCON 33. A rainbow sticker invites you to QueerCon mixers 16:00-18:00 at Chillout 2.

rooms.name: Forgotten Workshop
rooms.desc: Workbenches sag under piles of broken gears and cracked glass jars.

rooms.name: Gilded Vault
rooms.desc: Gold leaf still clings to cracked frescoes. A heavy bronze gate bars further passage.

rooms.name: Scribe's Library
rooms.desc: Towering shelves sag under the weight of moldy tomes; parchment scraps drift like leaves.

rooms.name: Collapsed Stairwell
rooms.desc: The stairwell drops into inky darkness, a cold draft rising from below.

rooms.name: Echoing Gallery
rooms.desc: Towering statues flank the corridor, their faces worn smooth by time.

rooms.name: Damp Crossroads
rooms.desc: Moist air and dripping water echo through the intersecting tunnels.

rooms.name: Chasm Bridge
rooms.desc: A narrow stone span crosses a seemingly bottomless chasm; pebbles rattle into the void.

rooms.name: Shrine of Echoes
rooms.desc: A circular chamber where every whisper returns amplified; candle stubs ring an obsidian altar.

rooms.name: Hall of Whispers
rooms.desc: Faint voices seem to drift along the walls, though none are present.

rooms.name: Flooded Passage
rooms.desc: Freezing water reaches your ankles and the ceiling dips uncomfortably low.

rooms.name: Mushroom Grotto
rooms.desc: Bioluminescent fungi paint the rock walls with soft blue green light.

rooms.name: Glowing Fungus Field
rooms.desc: A vast chamber carpeted with phosphorescent mushrooms that pulse gently.

rooms.name: Cavern of Roots
rooms.desc: Thick roots hang like ropes, swaying in an unseen breeze.

rooms.name: Crystal Cavern
rooms.desc: Jagged crystals jut from every surface, casting prismatic reflections.

rooms.name: Subterranean Dock
rooms.desc: Rotten wooden planks hint at boats long since decayed.

rooms.name: Blackwater Pool
rooms.desc: A still, dark pool absorbs all light, its depth unknowable.

rooms.name: Overgrown Armory
rooms.desc: Vines snake around corroded suits of armor and shattered shields.

rooms.name: Fallen Barracks
rooms.desc: Rows of crumbling bunks line the walls; a faint scent of smoke lingers.

rooms.name: Spore Choked Tunnel
rooms.desc: Billowing clouds of yellow spores drift lazily in the stale air.

rooms.name: Abyssal Gate
rooms.desc: A titanic stone door engraved with warning sigils looms out of the darkness.

rooms.name: Luminescent Marsh
rooms.desc: Pools of glowing algae cast an eerie teal glow over spindly reeds.

rooms.name: Twisting Root Maze
rooms.desc: Roots thicker than a man's thigh twist into an impossible labyrinth.

rooms.name: Bone Strewn Camp
rooms.desc: Charred fire pits and scattered bones tell of an ill fated expedition.

rooms.name: Vault Antechamber
rooms.desc: Smooth marble tiles lead to an imposing iron vault door fitted with intricate locks.

rooms.name: Old Rope Bridge
rooms.desc: A frayed rope bridge spans a gap; each plank creaks underfoot.

rooms.name: Ghastly Rift
rooms.desc: A cold wind howls through a jagged fissure that swallows light.

rooms.name: Hunger Den
rooms.desc: Scratch marks gouge the walls; the scent of damp fur lingers.

rooms.name: Sealed Treasury
rooms.desc: Massive stone slabs interlock seamlessly, hiding whatever lies beyond.

lamp.name: lamp
lamp.desc: An old brass oil lamp. It feels empty.

key.name: key
key.desc: A small brass key engraved with a sun symbol.

lockpick.name: lockpick
lockpick.desc: A bent hairpin - crude but serviceable for simple locks.

treasure.name: treasure
treasure.desc: A heap of glittering coins and gemstones.

scroll.name: scroll
scroll.desc: A brittle scroll covered in faded runes. Perhaps it holds a clue.

oil_can.name: oil_can
oil_can.desc: A small tin of lamp oil, half full.

silver_coin.name: silver_coin
silver_coin.desc: An ancient silver coin stamped with a forgotten monarch.

rope.name: rope
rope.desc: A sturdy length of rope - looks reliable.

defcon_badge.name: defcon_badge
defcon_badge.desc: A shiny lanyard from DEFCON 33 that hums with hacker energy.

queercon_flyer.name: queercon_flyer
queercon_flyer.desc: A vibrant QueerCon flyer inviting all to mixers and panels. Mixers run Thu-Sat 16:00-18:00 at Chillout 2. Everyone is welcome.

ancient_crown.name: ancient_crown
ancient_crown.desc: A jewel encrusted crown radiating silent authority.
